1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: A similar narration as no. 120. :Abu Eisa said: Sharik is alone in narrating this Hadith from Abu Al Yaqzan.[He said:] I asked Muhammad (ibn Isma'il AI-Bukhari) about this Hadlth. I said: "Adiyy bin Thabit from his father, from his grandfather; what is the name of Adiyy's grandfather?" But Muhammad did not know his name. And I mentioned to Muhammad that Yahya bin Ma'in said his name is Dinar, and he did not contradict him. Ahmad and 1shaq said ahout the Mustahadah: If she performs Ghusl for every prayer that is more prudent for her, and if she performs Wudu for each prayer, then that is acceptable from her, and if she combines between two prayers with (one) Ghusl then that is acceptable

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الْمُسْتَحَاضَةَ تَتَوَضَّأُ لِكُلِّ صَلاَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Mustahadah Performing Wudu For Every Prayer
